welcome.title: Welcome to the Intranet!
welcome.description: Welcome to the Intranet! Next, you need to join an organization or create a new one. You can navigate to the organization page yourself to create an organization or join one.

switch_role_after_join.title: Switch role
switch_role_after_join.description: You have been accepted into an organization. Please switch your role in the top menu to access the organization's features.

upload_identification_document.title: Upload identification document
upload_identification_document.description: Please upload your identification document (Cédula or Pasaporte) in your profile. The fields will be automatically filled after upload.

profile_complete.title: Complete your profile
profile_complete.description: To get started, you need to complete your profile with basic information. Please fill in the required fields: username, email, and language. Once saved, we'll continue with the tour.

join_or_create_organization.title: Join or create organization
join_or_create_organization.description: To fully use the system, you need to join an organization or create a new one. Click on the buttons above to create an organization or join one.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.description: Welcome to the Intranet! To fully use the system, you need to join an organization or create a new one. We will now guide you to the organization page.

dashboard_layout.title: Dashboard Overview
dashboard_layout.description: The Dashboard is your central entry point. Here you'll see all important information at a glance: your requests, statistics, and quick access to the most important features.

requests_section.title: Requests Section
requests_section.description: Here you'll see all your requests and applications. You can create new requests, track status, and respond to answers.

worktime_stats.title: Time Tracking Statistics
worktime_stats.description: This overview shows you your working hours, overtime, and more statistics about time tracking.

create_request_button.title: Create Request
create_request_button.description: Click here to create a new request. You can submit inquiries, applications, or improvement suggestions.

request_form.title: Request Form
request_form.description: Fill out the form to create a request. Select the responsible person, branch, and enter a description.

worktracker_menu.title: Navigate to Worktracker
worktracker_menu.description: Click here to go to the Worktracker. There you can manage your tasks and track status.

task_list.title: Task List
task_list.description: Here you'll see all your tasks. You can create, edit, change task status, and collaborate with other users.

create_task_button.title: Create Task
create_task_button.description: Create a new task to manage and track work. You can link tasks with requests and assign them to other users.

start_worktime.title: Start Time Tracking
start_worktime.description: Click here to start time tracking. Time will be automatically recorded until you stop it again.

stop_worktime.title: Stop Time Tracking
stop_worktime.description: Stop time tracking when you're done working. The recorded time will be automatically saved.

cerebro_menu.title: Open Cerebro Wiki
cerebro_menu.description: The Cerebro Wiki is your knowledge base. Here you'll find articles, documentation, and can create your own articles.

cerebro_search.title: Search Articles
cerebro_search.description: Search for articles in the wiki. You can search by keywords, browse articles, and create new content.

settings_menu.title: Go to Settings
settings_menu.description: In settings you can adjust your personal preferences, configure notifications, and restart the tour.

settings_overview.title: Settings
settings_overview.description: Here you can adjust your language, design (dark mode), notifications, and other personal settings.

myJoinRequests.title: My Join Requests

discovery.title: Find Competitor Listings
discovery.noCity: Please configure city in branch settings

hero.label: Intranet platform
hero.title: Hospitality & Consulting
hero.badge: Reduce workload • Control teams • Protect revenue
hero.headline: Your operation in your pocket – The Intranet for Pros
hero.subline: Stop WhatsApp chaos and paperwork. The complete solution for hostels, hotels, and consulting. All in one interface.

assets.placeholderWorktracker: Screenshot placeholder: Worktracker board with status flow and filters.
assets.placeholderConsultations: Screenshot placeholder: Consultations with QR invoices and monthly reports.
assets.placeholderDocument: Screenshot placeholder: AI document recognition with extracted fields.

hospitality.title: Hostels, Airbnbs, Hotels
hospitality.description: Shifts, housekeeping, check-in/out, keys and documents in one flow.
hospitality.point1: Control shifts and worktime live (time tracking, team control).
hospitality.point2: Tasks/housekeeping with status flow and notifications.
hospitality.point3: LobbyPMS/TTLock chain for check-in/out and key handover.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Capture billable consulting time and keep knowledge in sync.
consulting.point1: Track consultations (start/stop or manual) with clients and notes.
consulting.point2: Swiss QR invoices & monthly reports without double billing.
consulting.point3: Knowledge base via Cerebro wiki + tasks for deliverables.

operations.title: Operations & team control
operations.worktime: Start/stop worktime live, timezone-safe, stats per branch.
operations.worktracker: Tasks with status flow, responsible/QC, saved filters, notifications.
operations.teamControl: Team worktime overview, stop running times, export analytics.

knowledge.title: Knowledge & processes
knowledge.cerebro: Markdown wiki with structure, media, links to tasks/requests.
knowledge.workflow: Automations along roles and statuses; task descriptions are mandatory.

billing.title: Billing & consulting
billing.consultations: Pick clients, track consultations, notes with autosave.
billing.invoices: Swiss QR invoices, monthly reports, anti double billing, payment status.

ai.title: AI & automation
ai.documentRecognition: ID upload, AI extraction, validation, profile linkage.
ai.filters: Saved filters with AND/OR logic, standard filters per table.

integration.title: Integrations & mobile
integration.mobile: Mobile app for time, tasks and notifications.

proof.title: Real outcomes
proof.description: Fewer errors, faster flows, happier teams.
proof.review1: Shift handovers run cleanly, housekeeping is always up to date, check-in automation saves front desk time.
proof.review2: Consulting hours are audit-proof, QR invoices and monthly reports need no rework.

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.subtitle: Request a demo or register right away. Fully multilingual (de/en/es).
cta.formHint: Short form, we schedule a slot.
cta.formSecondary: Or register now and start immediately.
cta.formFallback: Please configure the demo endpoint. Form is not sending yet.

integration.q: How do you integrate with existing systems?
integration.a: LobbyPMS/TTLock is prepared. Further integrations are clarified during onboarding.

support.a: Support via the intranet with clear prioritization. Knowledge stored in the Cerebro wiki.

security.a: Roles/permissions, audits, AI uploads with validation, HTTPS only.

onboarding.a: Usually a few hours: branches, roles, standard filters, then go-live.

footer.title: Intranet for hospitality & consulting
footer.copy: More productivity, less chaos, full compliance.

seo.title: Intranet landing page – hospitality & consulting
seo.description: Time tracking, worktracker, wiki, consultations, invoices and AI document recognition for hostels, hotels, Airbnbs and consulting teams.
